document_data.mainbody:
The Life and Times of Grooble Stonepate was a work of fiction featuring a dwarf named Grooble Stonepate, written and published sometime before the late 14 century DR.
A copy of The Life and Times of Grooble Stonepate was kept in the library of Zerith Hold, Lord Purduns stronghold in the city of Duhlnarim in Erlkazar, around . Lord Purduns copy was notable for a doodle of Grooble Stonepate on the books inner cover. The image of was questionable quality and evidently drawn by someone whod never seen a dwarf.
